prescription.doctorNote: Follow-up consultation for arrhythmia management. Patient to bring home blood pressure logs. EKG scheduled prior to visit.
prescription.instructions: Do not consume caffeine 4 hours prior to the appointment. Wear loose clothing for EKG.

prescription.doctorNote: MRI of the Lumbar Spine completed. Results indicate mild disc herniation at L4-L5 level with slight nerve root impingement. No spinal stenosis observed.
prescription.instructions: Engage in gentle physiotherapy. Avoid heavy lifting (>10lbs). Follow up with Orthopedics in 2 weeks.

prescription.doctorNote: Patient presents with sudden onset of high fever (39°C), severe myalgia, and fatigue. Rapid antigen test confirmed Influenza A. Respiratory status stable with clear lungs.
prescription.instructions: Strict isolation for 5 days. Maintain high fluid intake and rest. Monitor temperature every 6 hours. Seek immediate care if shortness of breath or confusion occurs.

prescription.doctorNote: Initial consultation for right knee pain. Suspected meniscus tear. MRI ordered to confirm diagnosis. Physical examination shows limited range of motion.
prescription.instructions: Apply ice to the affected area for 20 minutes, 3 times a day. Use crutches if weight-bearing is painful.

prescription.doctorNote: Annual physical examination. All vitals within normal range. Blood work ordered for cholesterol and glucose screening. Vaccinations updated.
prescription.instructions: Maintain regular exercise routine and balanced diet. Schedule follow-up if blood work results appear abnormal.

prescription.doctorNote: Evaluation of eczema flair-up on forearms. Prescribed corticosteroid cream. Discussed potential allergic triggers.
prescription.instructions: Apply cream thinly twice daily for 1 week. Use fragrance-free moisturizers.

prescription.doctorNote: Consultation regarding seasonal allergies. Patient reports sneezing and itchy eyes. Recommended over-the-counter antihistamines.
prescription.instructions: Avoid outdoor activities during high pollen count days. Keep windows closed.
